data.name: O’Reilly Software Architecture Conference
data.description: Go deeper and broader on crucial topics such as microservices, serverless, leadership, and domain-driven design. Get the training you need to stay at the forefront of software architecture.

data.name: NYC SUG Monthly meetups 2019
data.description:
- - - -
6:00 - Arrivals and networking / 6:30 - Group exercise The NYC Scrum User Group meets monthly to talk about Scrum, to share experiences, to network, and to provide support for local Scrum practitioners. Interested in telling your own story? If you have an idea you would like to share, come…

data.name: QtDay 2020
data.description: QtDay is the unique conference on Qt framework in Italy. This is the eighth edition of QtDay. It was created and organized annually by Develer, the company who launched events like PyCon, EuroPython, GoLab, LinuxLab, Better Software, and Better Embedded.

data.name: T3chFest
data.description: Feria de informática y nuevas tecnologías en la Universidad Carlos III de Madrid. Aprende lo último en tecnología e innovación, demuestra lo que sabes en nuestros concursos y hackathon. 12, 13 y 14 de marzo de 2020.
